TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextTrailingWordEllipsis extends System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties

Docs.summary: Defines collapsed text properties for collapsing a whole line toward the end at word granularity, and with ellipsis being the collapsed text symbol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Line collapsing is the ability to reduce displaying space for a line by not showing part of the line's text. Depending on the collapsing style, a collapsing symbol may be shown at the location where the collapsed text occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 width, class System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties textRunProperties) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Double"> that represents the width for which the specified collapsed text range is constrained to.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> value that represents the set of shared text properties.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTrailingCharacterEllipsis"> class by specifying collapsed text properties.
Gets the style of collapsed text.
Gets the text run that is used as the collapsed text symbol.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> value that represents the collapsed text symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed double Width { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets the width for which the specified collapsed text range is constrained to.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Double"> that represents the width.
